sentences.english: You need to have done all of the research regarding your product or services' marketability.
sentences.chinese: 您需要做的所有有关研究您的产品或服务的适销性。

sentences.english: For the first time you transfer marketable products.
sentences.chinese: 第一时间为您传递适销对路的产品。

sentences.english: Second, developing marketable commodities to satisfy new consumer demand.
sentences.chinese: 二是开发适销商品，满足新型消费需求。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the market demand with the development of marketable products.
sentences.chinese: 同时，公司随市场需求不断开发适销对路产品。

sentences.english: The price is a bit high mahogany furniture in the exhibition is " marketable".

sentences.english: Ford has too few of the right products for today's market.
sentences.chinese: 福特公司现有的适销对路产品实在太少。

sentences.english: The products will be suitable for sale only when they meet with the standards.
sentences.chinese: 只有按标准设计和生产，才能适销对路。

sentences.english: The basic requirement of such assets is marketability.
sentences.chinese: 对这些资产的基本要求是具有适销性。

sentences.english: Making goods readily marketaBle is the Businessmen's fundamental technique of operation.
sentences.chinese: 使商品适销对路，是商家的基本经营术。

sentences.english: So you need both a good plan and a marketable product.
sentences.chinese: 所以你需要一个良好的计划和适销对路的产品。
